sentences.cn: …20世纪30年代法西斯主义的兴起。

sentences.en: Fascism cannot save capitalism, but only hastens its destruction.
sentences.cn: 法西斯主义救不了资本主义, 而只会加快其灭亡.
法西斯主义在意大利消灭了.

sentences.en: Fascism is a sickness in the soul.
sentences.cn: 法西斯主义则是灵魂的疾病.

sentences.en: Fascism is the most ruthless enemy of the people.
sentences.cn: 法西斯主义是人民最残酷无情的敌人.

sentences.en: Fascism served only to hasten its destruction.
sentences.cn: 法西斯主义只是加速了它的毁灭.

sentences.en: HOW DID FASCISM CONTRIBUTE TO THE COMING OF WORLD WAR II?
sentences.cn: 法西斯主义在挑起二战中起到了什么作用?

sentences.en: In such a macabre climax of degradation II Duce and Fascism passed into history.
sentences.cn: 意大利领袖和法西斯主义就是落得这样悲惨的可耻的下场而成为历史陈迹的.

sentences.en: It awakened millions to recognition of the dangers of fascism.
sentences.cn: 它使千百万群众认识了法西斯的危险性.

sentences.en: People began to crusade against Fascism.
She has a profound hatred of fascism.
sentences.cn: 她对法西斯主义怀有深仇大恨.

sentences.en: Stamp fascism into submission ; stamp out tyranny.
sentences.cn: 消灭法西斯主义; 消灭苛政.

sentences.en: The spectre of neo-fascism, as he put it, was stalking the streets of Sofia and other big cities.
sentences.cn: 用他的话来说，新法西斯主义的幽灵正在索非亚和其他大城市中游荡。

sentences.en: This is fucking fascism in a fucking bottle!
sentences.cn: 这是装在该死的瓶子里的该死的法西斯!

sentences.en: Where were the forces which could be rallied against fascism and militarism?
sentences.cn: 究竟到哪里才能找到可以团结的反法西斯和反军国主义的力量 呢 ?

sentences.en: With the failure of capitalism, fascism cast its shadow ever wider.
sentences.cn: 随着资本主义的失败, 法西斯主义扩大了它的影响.

words.tran_cn: 法西斯主义的，法西斯党的
法西斯党的；法西斯主义的（等于fascist）
法西斯主义者；法西斯党员

trans.tran_en: a  right-wing  political system in which people’s lives are completely controlled by the state and no political opposition is allowed
